about_the_game:
Each round pits two random YouTube videos against each other. Your task is to guess which video has more views or more comments.

You can choose which topic the videos are about using a list of pre-defined topics - or you can create your own based on your own interests.

You can play the game on your own or you can play online with up three other friends (so 4 players total) thanks to Steam's Remote Play Together feature. All players secretly submit their guesses and the correct answers and the winners are revealed when everyone has answered.

If a video looks particularly interesting, you can click it to open it up in your browser.

There are currently 15 achievements in the game waiting to be unlocked.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
